decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The sales and marketing suite shall be erected for a temporary period only, with it to be entirely removed before three years from the date of this permission. Following removal of the sales and marketing suite the land shall be landscaped in accordance with the approved 'legacy plan' (14.045-DP-MS-005) for the site.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Received 20/11/2014:
14.045-DP-MS-013.A, 14.045-DP-MS-012.B, 14.045-DP-MS-011.A, 14.045-DP-MS-010-A, CLDL-2299-01, Design & Access Statement (November 2014), Marketing Suite: Soft Features, Marketing Suite: Boundary Hedges, Ivy Screens & Shrub Planting
Received 18/12/2014: 14.045-DP-MS-005; Received 15/01/2015: STJ/1406021, 8716-6024, D395-9 Rev; Received 23/01/2015: 14.045-DP-MS-015-A; Received 30/01/2015: Arboricultural Technical Note 001, 14.045-DP-MS-010; Received 09/03/2015:
Foundation Construction Method Statement (Revision A 6th March 2015), 171, 6023-E, 6026-B, 6027, 6028) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - Before first occupation of the sales and marketing suite, turning space and parking spaces (including spaces for people with disabilities) shall be provided within the curtilage of the site in accordance with the scheme shown on drawing No. 14.045-DP-MS-010-A and such spaces shall be permanently available and not be used for any other purpose. A minimum of four spaces shall be allocated for boat resident parking at all times.

Condition : 5 - During construction and servicing of the sales and marketing suite, no vehicles shall park/load/unload/wait/pick up/drop off on Richmond Road at any time. No skip/construction materials shall be kept on the carriageway or footway of Richmond Road at any time.
Condition : 6 - No construction/servicing vehicles shall enter/exit the site by reversing to/from Richmond Road.
Condition : 7 - The finished floor levels of the hereby permitted sales and marketing suite shall be set no lower than 5.60AOD.
Condition : 8 - The sales and marketing suite hereby permitted shall not be occupied as a dwelling.
Condition : 9 - All work to trees shall be carried out to BS Specification 3998 (As Amended) and in accordance with the recommendations of Arboricultural Technical Note 001 dated 29th January 2015.

Condition : 10 - Groundworks for the development shall only take place in accordance with the 'Foundation Construction Method Statement for The Marketing Suite' (6th March 2015 -Revision A); including appropriate provision for archaeological monitoring, investigation and reporting.
description: Erection of a temporary sales and marketing suite for a period of 3 years including landscaping and boundary improvements
